description: Bring Italian flavours to your dinner table with this speedy tomato and chicken farfalle pasta dish.
name: Easy Tomato & Chicken Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 56 g Continental salt-reduced chicken stock pots

recipeInstructions.text: Return chicken to pan. Add pasta and reserved cooking liquid and cook, tossing for 5 minutes or until heated through. Remove from heat. Season with freshly ground black pepper. Top with basil leaves to serve.
